title: New Client won't let me buy champions
body: I have 1400ish IP and I'm trying to buy Jax for 1350 but it says I don't have enough. Then I try to buy a 450 champion and it says my IP balance will be 593 IP which means it isn't registering about 300 of my IP. I know I have the proper amount of IP because the last thing I bought was a 2050 IP Life % Quintessence rune and my balance was like 10 IP afterwards. It also won't let me switch back to the legacy client on either of my 2 computers. What do I do?

replies.body: I AM HAVING THE SAME ISSUE AND SUBMITTED A TICKET

This is a new issue that popped up after the store outage last week. We're investigating into what's causing it, but for right now, I'd reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work together to resolve this for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ive got the same issue, but for me its not considering around 400 ip. Its quite annoying and i hope it gets fixed.
